Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_Disappointment
Text.Desc: Even this level of person can be a Branch Leader? I guess even I could become Branch Leader at this rate...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that it is easy to be dissatisfied by such a disappointing Branch Leader

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_ZhangMen1
Text.Desc: I'm so glad that [TXT] has become our Sect Leader!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_ZhangMen2
Text.Desc: [TXT] has become our Sect Leader, this is horrible!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_ZhangMen3
Text.Desc: I think I could still serve as Sect Leader...

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_ZhangMen4
Text.Desc: Unfortunately, [TXT] will no longer be our Sect Leader!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_ZhangMen5
Text.Desc: [TXT] will no longer be our Sect Leader...this is great!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_TangZhu0
Text.Desc: I've become a Branch Leader...I must do my best to live up to this position!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_TangZhu1
Text.Desc: I'm so glad that [TXT] has become Branch Leader!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_TangZhu2
Text.Desc: Even [TXT] has become a Branch Leader? I guess anyone could become Branch Leader at this rate.

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_TangZhu3
Text.Desc: I feel that I could continue on as Branch Leader...dedicating myself to the Sect...

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_TangZhu4
Text.Desc: I can't believe that [TXT] is no longer going to be our Branch Leader!

Text.Name: Mood_Sys_School_TangZhu5
Text.Desc: Finally, [TXT] is no longer going to be our Branch Leader!
